catalog_script_client.name: Populate user details

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_e02590df47efb1101c89dffe046d439a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:d9473d8547d275101c89dffe046d4335</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate user details</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var user = g_form.getValue('opened_for');
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('userDetails');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','requestor_info');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_user_name',user);
	ga.getXML(responseParse);
	
	function responseParse(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		var ans = answer.evalJSON();
		for (var k = 0; k < ans.length; k++) {
			alert(ans[k].email);
			g_form.setValue('phone',ans[k].phone);
			g_form.setValue('location',ans[k].location);
			g_form.setValue('email',ans[k].email);
					
			
		}
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-10 11:48:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e02590df47efb1101c89dffe046d439a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate user details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Finance Service Management" source="x_1106871_financ_0">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Service Management">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e02590df47efb1101c89dffe046d439a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-10 11:48:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Requestor Information">edd841914723f1101c89dffe046d4397</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
